main event: A person in Meredith, New Hampshire observed an unidentified object in the sky on July 5, 1962.
interesting points: The object appeared to be an aircraft but was 'backing away' and had a 'fin'.
The object was observed for about 30 seconds.
The object disappeared as it moved down and out of sight.
The witness was preparing to observe Venus when the object was noticed.
The witness had seen similar objects in the past during the daytime.
sighted object: an unidentified object that appeared to be an aircraft but had a fin and was 'backing away'
